summary: A comprehensive unit‑test suite that validates the FastSpeech2Conformer speech synthesis model, checking its configuration, initialization, forward‑pass signature, output tensors (hidden states, attentions, duration, energy, pitch), gradient handling, embedding inputs, pretrained loading, and strict save/load behavior.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the FastSpeech2Conformer model for production speech synthesis pipelines, facilitating safe deployment, maintenance, and continuous integration.
